post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
작성자   : SK

A Job Fair Info;

As a valued subscriber to htc - Canada's HiTech Career Journal, you are invited to come and
join us at BrassRing's Toronto Tech Career Event taking place on Wednesday, September 5th &
Thursday, September 6th, at the Metro Toronto Convention Centre, 255 Front Street West, North
building. You are required to have 2+ years of technical working experience to attend.
Show hours are as follows: Wednesday 4:00 pm - 7:00 pm & Thursday 11:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m & 4:00
pm - 7:00 pm.

You will have an opportunity to meet face-to-face with hiring managers from top Canadian and
U.S. firms who are looking to hire IT and Engineering professionals. So, please bring along
several copies of your resume on plain, white paper and be ready to conduct interviews on-site.
post.title: [2001/8/31] BrassRing Jon Fair again
